attributes.action: make it law that erasable pens are allowed in exams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please, bring back rules that allow erasable pens to be used in exams. Some people are forgettful, and need to change things once they are written down. 

Please allow these again! And make it law. Some students cant afford to fail exams, and not allowing tippex and erasable pens, now cant change their mind!

rejection.details: Please provide both your first and last names when submitting a petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
